title: An exquisite commentarie vpon the Reuelation of Saint Iohn VVherein, both the course of the whole booke, as also the more abstruse and hard places thereof not heretofore opened; are now at last most cleerely and euidently explaned. By Patrik Forbes of Corse.
author: Forbes, Patrick, 1564-1635.
publisher: Printed by W. Hall, for Francis Burton, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyeard, at the signe of the Greene Dragon,
